rationale: The segment discusses genetic sequencing results but does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Notably, the genetic sequence of a key component of the virus [H5N1] the hemagglutinin subunit was an exact match to the hemagglutinin sequences from two earlier human cases tied to the dairy outbreak, officials said.

Notably, the genetic sequence of a key component of the virus [H5N1] the hemagglutinin subunit was an exact match to the hemagglutinin sequences from two earlier human cases tied to the dairy outbreak, officials said.
